# dnacenter_pnp_device_claim_to_site (Data Source)

It performs create operation on Device Onboarding (PnP).

- Claim a device based on DNA-C Site based design process. Different parameters are required for different device
platforms.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dnacenter_pnp_device_claim_to_site" "example" {
  provider  = dnacenter
  device_id = "string"
  site_id   = "string"
  type      = "string"
  hostname  = "string"
  config_info {
    config_id = "string"
    config_parameters {
      key   = "string"
      value = "string"
    }
  }
  image_info {
    image_id = "string"
    skip     = "false"
  }
}
```
